about_the_game:
The soundtrack to the biopunk-antiutopia Athanasy is a chimera of synthwave, dark ambient, industrial and trip-hop, combined of the cold digital synthesis of Loving Grace Machines, industrial noises and the voices coming from underground.
In the corridors of the last City on Earth you can listen to Hotel Alpha Unicorn, Cult Black Venus, musty luxury, Sal Solaris and Noises of Russia.

Egor Efremov (Hotel Alpha Unicorn) — music, sound design, mixing and mastering, field recording, vocals, Volca Keys, Volca FM, Behringer Crave, Theremini
Anastasia Zelenskaya (Cult Black Venus, La Barbe Bleu) — music, vocals (4, 5, 20, 29), piano (29)
Liza Shapkina — vocals (15, 17)
musty luxury — music (11)
Sal Solaris — music (22)
Noises of Russia — Music (19)
